course_description: The sociological factors affecting health and the organization of health care. The medical care services and professionals as social institutions; social history of health, environmental sources of disease, mental health, and effects of technology on health care.
prerequisites: SOC_OX 101 or SOC 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3186, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MWF 2:30-3:20p, Instructor: A. Fitzroy, Status: Open
